text: Maggie McNamara (June 18, 1927 - February 18, 1978) was an American actress and model. She acted mostly in movies. She was in the controversial 1953 movie The Moon is Blue. McNamara acted in theater plays. She was born in New York City. McNamara committed suicide using barbiturates. She died at age 49. title: Maggie McNamara
